name: Pen Pals
description:
Things are going HAYwire down at the farm! Corral a herd of particularly round barnyard friends back into the pen. When two matching animals bump into each other, you'll find an even larger animal in their place. Things get crowded quickly, so get a mooove on in Pen Pals!

  • Over a dozen different stages, with unique looks and wacky changes to the game!
  • Chain your merges to score extra points. Rack up that combo and impress those animals!
  • Three target scores to beat for each level. Go for the gold!
  • At least ten adorably round barnyard friends, plus one very judgmental donkey
  • Unlock secret goodies as you play! What mysteries await you?
